incident_updates.body: Ongoing actions : Our teams will replace the affected the current equipment as mentioned in this link: Maintenance link

Our technical teams aren't able to perform the maintenance at the moment. The maintenance has been postponed. 
We will inform you of the new dates in the near future.
Ongoing actions : Our teams will replace the affected the current equipment as mentioned in this link: Maintenance link

Start time : 29/07/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience increased latency on services hosted on WAW infrastructure. Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently fixing this problem. A replacement of the affected equipment is being considered.

Start time : 11/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 11/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be replacing faulty batteries on the altigo.

Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the intervention. We apologize for the inconvenience caused Start time : 11/08/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 11/08/2022 10:00 UTC
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the intervention to the following dates Start time : 10/08/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 10/08/2022 10:00 UTC

Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
